in.teramatrix.flint.driver.custom

Class ActionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.custom.ActionBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleActionBuilder, SingleActionBuilder

    public abstract class ActionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    It is default alert dialog of the application. In the app, nobody should use AlertDialog directly to maintain theme of the application. There are two different implementations of this class, first is SingleActionBuilder having only a single button whereas another one is DoubleActionBuilder that contains two buttons. This class is structured using Builder Pattern so it is easy to use also.
    Author:
    Mohsin Khan
    Date:
    8/30/2016

    • Field Detail

      • dialog

        protected android.app.Dialog dialog
        Instead of making your own Dialog, it was more reliable and easy to obtain from inbuilt Dialog and then customize according to our need. Below object is highly customizable.

      • view

        protected android.view.View view
        main layout to inflate in dialog

      • activity

        protected android.app.Activity activity
        To create View at runtime and show Dialog

      • txtTitle

        private android.widget.TextView txtTitle
        Title of the alert dialog like "Warning", "Information", "Critical" etc. But still is not mandatory element of the dialog.

      • txtMessage

        private android.widget.TextView txtMessage
        This will be subtitle or informative part of the dialog. It is mandatory element but no checks are enabled to verify.

      • cancelable

        private boolean cancelable
        A bit that define, user can cancel dialog without pressing buttons or not.
